channel.title: Tooluxe - Multi-Tool Web Application
channel.description: Free online tools for everyday tasks including QR scanner, password generator, text-to-speech, text analyzer, and unit converter.

item.title: QR Code Scanner Tool
item.description: Scan QR codes using your device's camera. Quickly access websites, contact information, and more.

item.title: Password Generator Tool
item.description: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options for length and character types.

item.title: Text to Speech Tool
item.description: Convert text to spoken words with adjustable voice options, speed, and pitch controls.

item.title: Text Analyzer Tool
item.description: Analyze text for word count, character count, reading time, and other useful metrics.

item.title: Unit Converter Tool
item.description: Convert between different units of measurement including length, weight, temperature, and more.

item.title: Weather Forecast Tool
item.description: Get real-time weather information for any location with temperature, humidity, and wind details.

item.title: URL Shortener Tool
item.description: Create short, shareable links from long URLs. Perfect for social media, emails, and messaging.

item.title: Color Picker Tool
item.description: Select, preview, and convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats. Save your favorite colors.

item.title: Image Enhancer
item.description: Enhance your images with brightness, contrast, saturation, blur, and sharpness adjustments. Perfect for quick image editing.
